page.title: 03A FAMILY BUSINESS
page.content: Today, running a business entails more work and responsibility both to myself and the public. Once time stood still; now more money has to be taken in order to cover increased costs and an alarm system is a necessity to guard increased value of stock. Value added tax and P.A.Y.E. takes time to work out. We carry sidelines in the form of horticultural aids as well as stationery, sweets and newspapers. Once the newspapers were delivered by young boys and girls. This is no longer economical so personal folders are now used and customers collect their own. However in spite of certain difficulties, my family business is enjoyable and interesting, bringing me into contact with many local inhabitants.
